Package me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.reflect.glow

Class Glowing

java.lang.Object
me.hapyl.spigotutils.module.reflect.glow.Glowing
All Implemented Interfaces:
GlowingListener, Ticking
public class Glowing extends Object implements Ticking, GlowingListener
Allows to create per-player glowing.
